PFE.title: Pfizer Says Paxlovid Revenue Adjustment In Q1 Is Possible
PFE.text: Jan 30 (Reuters) - Pfizer Inc <PFE.N>::PFIZER SPOKESPERSON SAYS POSSIBLE THERE COULD BE REVENUE ADJUSTMENT IN Q1 FOR PAXLOVID AS WINDOW FOR U.S. GOVERNMENT RETURNS STILL OPEN.Further company coverage: PFE.N. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

PFE.title: Pfizer Records $3.5 Bln Revenue Reversal For COVID Pill Paxlovid In Q4
PFE.text: Jan 30 (Reuters) - Pfizer Inc <PFE.N>::PFIZER CEO, IN PREPARED REMARKS, SAYS THAT CO IS FOCUSED ON EXPANDING RETAIL CONTRACTING AND OFFERINGS TO GAIN MARKET SHARE IN THE RSV VACCINE MARKET.PFIZER EXEC SAYS RECORDED $3.5 BILLION REVENUE REVERSAL FOR COVID PILL PAXLOVID IN THE FOURTH QUARTER.PFIZER SAYS Q4 RESULTS INCLUDED A $1.4 BILLION INTANGIBLE ASSET IMPAIRMENT CHARGE ASSOCIATED WITH ULCERATIVE COLITIS DRUG ETRASIMOD.PFIZER SAYS RECORDED A NEARLY $1 BILLION INTANGIBLE ASSET IMPAIRMENT FOR PNEUMOCOCCAL DISEASE PREVENTION VACCINE PREVNAR 13.Further company coverage: PFE.N. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).
